title: I can imagine Riot working on ideas for Poppy's new ult.
body:
_Players liked the idea of locking out an enemy from doing anything to her. How can we keep that aspect for players in a way that adds counterplay but still have a meaningful impact in teamfights?_

Well how about having her _knocking out_ an enemy.

_Like a stun?_

More like a large knock back.

_Lee and Xin already do that, how will she be different?_

What if she sends them back to base?

_So the counterplay would be to be close to your base, so you don't have to walk back as far?_

AoE, with wind up.

_Now we are getting somewhere_

Great for getting enemies off objectives.

_Locking them out, you could say._


**
And so on...**
